description: This file defines the root layout and setup for a Remix application, including linking stylesheets, meta tags, and rendering outlet components.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Provides an array of link objects for preconnecting to fonts and loading a Google Fonts stylesheet.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: A React component that sets up the HTML structure, including meta tags, links, and rendering children.

methods.name: App
methods.description: The main React component that renders the Outlet for nested routes.
